edge_1: Elijah Wood portrays Frodo Baggins in the film series.
edge_2: Frodo Baggins, a young hobbit, continues his quest to destroy the Ring, which continues to weaken and tempt him.

edge_1: Viggo Mortensen portrays Aragorn in the film series.
Andy Serkis portrays Sméagol in the film series and also voices Gollum.
edge_2: Sméagol is a wretched and treacherous creature who was once one of the river-folk (an extinct race of hobbits) and now guides Frodo and Sam into Mordor while seeking the Ring. The first scenes in the film portray him in his former life as Sméagol as well as his deterioration into Gollum.

edge_1: Billy Boyd portrays Peregrin Took in the film series and also portrays Pippin.
edge_2: Peregrin Took, better known as Pippin, is a cousin of Frodo's who becomes an esquire of Gondor.

edge_1: Dominic Monaghan portrays Meriadoc Brandybuck in the film series and also portrays Merry.
edge_2: Meriadoc Brandybuck, better known as Merry, is a cousin of Frodo's who becomes an esquire of Rohan.

edge_1: John Rhys-Davies portrays Gimli in the film series and also voices Treebeard.
edge_2: Gimli is a dwarf warrior and companion to Aragorn along with Legolas.

edge_1: Actor John Rhys-Davies portrays the character of Gimli, a dwarf warrior and companion to Aragorn in 'The Lord of the Rings' trilogy.
edge_2: Gimli is a dwarf warrior and companion to Aragorn along with Legolas.

edge_1: Apart from playing Gimli, John Rhys-Davies also gave voice to Treebeard, the ent leader in 'The Lord of the Rings'.
edge_2: Rhys-Davies also voices Treebeard, the ent leader.

edge_1: Actor Orlando Bloom essayed the role of Legolas, an elven prince of Mirkwood and skilled archer in 'The Lord of the Rings'.
edge_2: After stabbing Saruman, Brad Dourif's character Gríma Wormtongue was shot by Legolas in the movie.

edge_1: In 'The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King', Miranda Otto's character Éowyn falls in love with Aragorn, but he does not reciprocate her feelings.
As per the Extended Edition of the movie, Brad Dourif plays the character of Gríma Wormtongue.
edge_2: In the movie, Gríma Wormtongue is Saruman's sycophantic and treacherous servant.

edge_2: Gríma Wormtongue was Saruman's sycophantic servant as depicted in the movie.
